mean_en: an organization consisting of the United Kingdom and other countries, including most of the countries that used to be part of the British Empire; used in the official names of, and to refer to, some states of the US (Kentucky, Massachusetts, Pennsylvania and Virginia)
sentence: The Commonwealth consists of countries that used to be part of the British Empire.
sentence_trans: 英联邦由一些曾经隶属大英帝国的国家组成的。
word_etyma: common普通，共同 + wealth财富 → commonwealth共和国，联邦
